description:
Twitter designed to fit your Touchpad! TweetPad features super smooth scrolling and the touchpad's 3 panel design for naturally browsing Twitter. Open photos and webpages without leaving the app.

Basic Twitter features are free in TweetPad, including new free features like photo support and conversation view to see all replies to a tweet.

TweetPad Pro is available in the app, and includes highly requested features including multi-account support, twitter search, twitter trends, direct messages and twitter lists.
